At the beginning, technology and writing can be directly unlocked. [NewLine] can allocate funds to different colleges to obtain corresponding results. When players enter the new era, they will be evaluated. The college that has accumulated the most funds and reaches the minimum will be promoted to the scholar level and get canned distribution of knowledge

It is a compulsory course for the students of Liduofandi College. Each round can get meager funding subsidies and rich knowledge returns. With certain talents, it is easier to draw [NewLine] After completion, you will receive a one-time grant, recruit or sponsor one [ICON_GreatPerson] great person, will return 25% of the consumed [ICON_GreatPerson] great person points
